meanings.definition: Resembling leather in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The new sofa had a leatherlike feel to it.
meanings.sent2: Her leatherlike jacket was stylish and durable.
meanings.sent3: The leatherlike notebook cover fooled everyone into thinking it was real leather.
meanings.sent4: The chef's apron was so worn out, it looked leatherlike from all the stains.
meanings.sent5: The sunburn left her skin looking leatherlike and painful.
